title: Is the flashlight on the Pixel 5 dimmer than previous models? I used it today and it seemed very dim
content:
I was looking for something in a dark room and used the Torch as I had done many times before and it seemed to be quite dim.

My brother has a Pixel 3 and I checked against his. His phone seems extremely bright with both the camera flash and flashlight, whereas mine seems very dim.

Is this due to an update or a possible hardware issue?
